Last year, our elevator motor began doing that to spark maxes. We burned 3 up before realizing it was the motor (a regular neo).\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eEventually, we figured out that we think it was the gearbox. we did not use spacers on our last rebuild of the elevator. We think the gears were not meshing right because of the mounting plate bending.
